# Instructions


1. Download this: [`PS7`](/files/ps7.zip), *unzip* it, then double-click on the `.Rproj` file to open RStudio

2. Replace the `your-name` part of the R Markdown file `your-name_problem-set-6.Rmd` to something that matches your name and open it in RStudio

3. Complete the tasks in the R Markdown file. Fill out code in the empty chunks provided and replace YOUR ANSWER HERE with your answers to the questions.

4. When you’re all done, click on the “Knit” button at the top of the editing window and create a Word document of your problem set. Upload the Word doc to Blackboard.
